name: RELX
goal: RELX is a global provider of information-based analytics and decision tools for professional and business customers. We help scientists make new discoveries, doctors and nurses improve the lives of patients and lawyers win cases. We prevent online fraud and money laundering, and help insurance companies evaluate and predict risk. Our events enable customers to learn about markets, source products and complete transactions. In short, we enable our customers to make better decisions, get better results and be more productive.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
copyright framework - InfoSoc Directive
research - Science 2.0, Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe
data - General Data Protection Regulation, open data, research data
